09 December 2008 10:38:29 AM

ZIGGURAT_PRB
  C version:
  Test the routines in the ZIGGURAT library.

TEST01
  SHR3 returns pseudorandom uniformly distributed
  unsigned long integers.

       0     123456789     123456789

  floats between 0 and 1.

TEST03

  real numbers between 0 and 1.

TEST04

  real numbers between 0 and 1.

       0     123456789     123456789

       1   -1579999415    2714967881        0.863714
       2   -2056153900    2238813396        0.171523

TEST05
  Measure the time it takes SHR3 to generate
  1000000 unsigned long int values.

  0.048775 seconds

TEST06
  Measure the time it takes R4_UNI to generate
  1000000 uniformly random float values.

  0.226568 seconds

TEST07
  Measure the time it takes R8_NOR to generate
  1000000 normal random float values.

  0.145788 seconds

TEST08
  Measure the time it takes R4_EXP to generate
  1000000 exponential random float values.

  0.154193 seconds

ZIGGURAT_PRB
  Normal end of execution.
